item.title: `void swap(basic_result &)`
item.description: Swap one basic_result with another. Requires: Always available. Complexity: Same as for the swap() implementations of the value_type and error_type. The noexcept of underlying operations is propagated. Guarantees: If an exception is thrown during the operation, the state of both operands on entry is restored, if at least one of the underlying operations is marked noexcept.
